description.value:
Until the spell ends, bits of rock spread across your body, and you gain the following benefits:

  • You are immune to poison damage and have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.
  • You are immune to disease, being poisoned or petrified and cannot be knocked prone unless you allow it.
  • When you take the attack action, you can replace one of your attacks to create a small earthquake on the ground in a 15-foot radius centered on you. Other creatures on that ground must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
  • You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without spending extra movement. You can move through solid earth or stone as if it was air and without destabilizing it. If you end your movement there, the duration of the spell is reduced by 1 minute each time. If you run out of the spells duration, you are ejected to the nearest unoccupied space, this spell ends, and you are stunned until the end of your next turn.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level or higher, the duration granted no longer requires concentration.
